name: Spy League: Training
description:
Overview

Spy League: Training is a third person arena shooter where you must survive waves of enemies either alone or with a friend.

Controls

Left trigger (hold): Aim weapon.

Right trigger (press while aiming): Fire weapon.

Y (press while aiming): Swap aiming shoulder.

Left stick: Move.

Right stick: Look.

X (press): Reload weapon.

A (press): Jump.

Options (press): Pause.

 Recommendations

It is recommended to play the game with a controller.
